FOOTER.SOBRE-TEXTO: We are a networking platform with the goal of increasing the capacity of all artists and art lovers to create and establish a better bussiness relationship between themselves, creating, this way, more business contacts, more sales, more knowledge and more engagement.
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: 2021 All Rights Reserved by Team Padawans

INICIO.TITULO: The best place to connect yourself with art
INICIO.SUBTITULO: We are anetworking platform for artists and art lovers
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTITULO: Create, display and sell your art. Discover new works and talk to their creators. Search for products and services and purchase them through the platform itself. Art+ is your social network for sharing and trading content from various artistic fields. Come see!
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO1: Search by name or category for your favorite artists and find their designs and items for sale.
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO2: Display your products and services on a personalized page where all members of the community can get in touch.
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO3: Follow the works of great artists and interact with people from around the world.
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO4: Connect with profiles that share your personal and professional interests
INICIO.PLANOS-SUBTITULO: The free plan already offers you all the features of Art+, the Premium plan makes you go even further. For a small monthly fee, it grants you new customization options, dissemination on the platform and access to a Dashboard function that allows you to view your profile metrics at any time. Get all these advantages and gain benefits for your profile and your business.
